```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dint)
```


```{r}

dd <- data.frame(
  date = seq(date_yq(2012, 4), date_yq(2018, 4)),
  V1 = 1:25
)

ggplot(
  dd,
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = V1
  )
) + 
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date_yq(breaks = date_yq_breaks(3)) 




ggplot(
  dd[get_year(dd$date) %in% 2014, ],
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = V1
  )
) + 
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date_yq()


```



## print each quarter

```{r}

ggplot(
  dd[get_year(dd$date) %in% 2013, ],
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = V1
  )
) + 
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date_yq()

ggplot(
  dd[get_year(dd$date) %in% 2013:2014, ],
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = V1
  )
) + 
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date_yq()


```

# date_ym

```{r, eval = FALSE}
dd <- data.frame(
  date = seq(date_ym(1950, 1), date_ym(2018, 11)),
  V1 = 1
)

ggplot(
  dd,
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = V1
  )
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date_ym()



ggplot(
  dd[600:700, ],
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = V1
  )
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date_ym()


ggplot(dd[1:3, ],
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = V1
  )
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date_ym()


ggplot(dd[1:12, ],
  aes(
    x = date,
    y = V1
  )
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date_ym()

date_ym_breaks()(dd[1:3, ]$date)

```
